00011 #include <list>
00012 
00013 namespace Util
00014 {
00015 
00016    using std::list;
00017 
00018    // Base class for component observers
00019    template <typename Event> class Observer;
00020    
00040    template <typename Event>
00041    class Notifier
00042    {
00043    
00044    public:
00045 
00046       // Compiler default constructor.
00047 
00048       // Compiler destructor.
00049   
00055       void registerObserver(Observer<Event>& observer);
00056    
00062       void removeObserver(Observer<Event>& observer);
00063    
00067       void notifyObservers(const Event& event);
00068    
00069    private:
00070    
00072       std::list<Observer<Event>*> observerPtrs_;
00073 
00074    };
00075   
00076    /* 
00077    * Register an observer (add to list).
00078    */
00079    template <typename Event>
00080    void Notifier<Event>::registerObserver(Observer<Event>& observer)
00081    {
00082       observerPtrs_.push_back(&observer);
00083    }
00084    
00085    /* 
00086    * Remove an observer from the list.
00087    */
00088    template <typename Event>
00089    void Notifier<Event>::removeObserver(Observer<Event>& observer)
00090    {
00091       observerPtrs_.remove(&observer);
00092    }
00093 
00094    /* 
00095    * Notify observers by calling their update methods.
00096    */
00097    template <typename Event>
00098    void Notifier<Event>::notifyObservers(const Event& event)
00099    {
00100       typename std::list< Observer<Event>* >::iterator pos;
00101       pos = observerPtrs_.begin();
00102       while (pos != observerPtrs_.end())
00103       {
00104          (*pos)->update(event);
00105          ++pos;
00106       }
00107    }
00108 
00109 
00110 }
00111 #endif
